Standards.description: The Phenopacket Schema is an ISO-endorsed open standard for sharing disease and phenotype information.
Standards.name: Phenopackets

Ontologies.description: The HPO provides a standardized vocabulary of phenotypic abnormalities in human disease.
Ontologies.name: HPO

Ontologies.description: The Mondo Disease Ontology aims to harmonizes disease definitions across the world.
Ontologies.name: Mondo

Ontologies.description: The Uberon Anatomy Ontology is an integrated cross-species anatomy ontology.
Ontologies.name: Uberon Anatomy Ontology

Tools.description: The Exomiser is a tool for finding potential disease-causing variants in whole-exome or whole-genome sequencing data.
Tools.name: Exomiser

Tools.description: The Monarch Monarch Knowledge Graph & Services integrates gene, disease, and phenotype data across species.
Tools.name: Monarch Knowledge Graph & Services
